mapper.select: SELECT PROGRM_FILE_NM AS "progrmFileNm" , PROGRM_STRE_PATH AS "progrmStrePath" , PROGRM_KOREAN_NM AS "progrmKoreanNm" , PROGRM_DC AS "progrmDc" , URL AS "URL" FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.PROGRM_FILE_NM , TB.PROGRM_STRE_PATH , TB.PROGRM_KOREAN_NM , TB.PROGRM_DC , TB.URL FROM ( SELECT PROGRM_FILE_NM , PROGRM_STRE_PATH , PROGRM_KOREAN_NM , PROGRM_DC , URL FROM COMTNPROGRMLIST WHERE PROGRM_KOREAN_NM like '%'|| #{searchKeyword}||'%' ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{firstIndex} + 1 AND #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "totcnt" FROM COMTNPROGRMLIST WHERE PROGRM_KOREAN_NM like '%'|| #{searchKeyword}||'%'

SELECT PROGRM_FILE_NM AS "progrmFileNm" , PROGRM_STRE_PATH AS "progrmStrePath" , PROGRM_KOREAN_NM AS "progrmKoreanNm" , PROGRM_DC AS "progrmDc" , URL AS "URL" FROM COMTNPROGRMLIST WHERE PROGRM_FILE_NM = #{progrmFileNm}
